


<!-- @namespace    sugar.js.dom -->

# ```js scrollLeft ```


Get the amount of scroll left



## Example (js)

```js
import scrollLeft from '@coffeekraken/sugar/js/dom/scrollLeft'
scrollLeft() // 40
```
